sourcesContent:
close

Warning!

Blogs submitted without signing in expire after three days. Consider signing in before posting your blog to retain your post.

Sign In!

Your blogs will remain indefinitely.

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-confirmation-modal', templateUrl: './post-confirmation-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-confirmation-modal.component.css'] }) export class PostConfirmationModalComponent { @Input() isOpen = true; close() { this.isOpen = false; } }
